definitions.definition: (in bridge, whist, and similar card games) a playing card of the suit chosen to rank above the others, which can win a trick where a card of a different suit has been led.
the suit having the rank above the others in a particular hand.
(in a tarot pack) any of a special suit of 22 cards depicting symbolic and typical figures and scenes.
a valuable resource that may be used, especially as a surprise, in order to gain an advantage.
examples: noun: trump card; plural noun: trump cards

definitions.definition: (in bridge, whist, and similar card games) play a trump on (a card of another suit), having no cards of the suit led.
beat (someone or something) by saying or doing something better.
examples: taste trumps most if not all other factors when consumers choose food products
synonyms: leave standing "by wearing the simplest of dresses

definitions.definition: a trumpet or a trumpet blast.
